item.title: Lock out user after three failed login attempts
item.description: 1 Lock out user after three failed login attempts 本文为摘录，原文为： https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Security#Lock_out_user_after_three_failed_login_attempts 1 Lock out user after three failed login attempts 截至 pambase 20200721.1-2 版本，pam_faillock.so 已默认启用，当用户在 15 分钟内尝试 3 次登
